name: JAZZZ
description:
Jazz is out of control!

Avoid the tomatoes being thrown at you and the loose drums rolling across the stage. Collect music notes to get back some Jazz Juice and increase that high score!

The longer you last the crazier it gets!

Thanks to Joe Knapp, Tom Boswell, Luke Shadler, and Will Tait for making this awesome game with me.

Music credit to:

Lovely Swindler by Amarià https://soundcloud.com/amariamusique
